comment: REVIEW FINDINGS - NON-COMPLIANT. The RTM contains inaccurate test function references that break traceability. Section 4 Summary Matrix and Section 5.9 Prompt Generation reference test function names that do not exist in the test suite. DEFICIENCIES: (1) REQ-PROMPT-001: RTM references 'test_review_task_includes_prompt' but actual test is 'test_review_task_prompt_generated'. (2) REQ-PROMPT-002: RTM references 'test_prompt_yaml_files_exist' but actual test is 'test_prompts_directory_exists'. (3) REQ-PROMPT-003: RTM references 'test_hierarchical_prompt_lookup' but actual test is 'test_prompts_have_workflow_phase_context'. (4) REQ-PROMPT-004: RTM references 'test_checklist_generation' but actual test is 'test_review_prompt_has_checklist'. (5) REQ-PROMPT-005: RTM references 'test_prompt_content_structure' but actual test is 'test_prompt_has_required_sections'. (6) REQ-PROMPT-006: RTM references 'test_custom_sections' but actual test is 'test_prompt_supports_custom_content'. CORRECTIVE ACTION REQUIRED: Update all six test function references in both Section 4 (Summary Matrix, lines 125-130) and Section 5.9 (Traceability Details) to match actual test function names. Verified: Test counts are accurate (98 total). Frontmatter title verified: 'QMS CLI Requirements Traceability Matrix'. Frontmatter revision_summary verified: 'CR-028: Initial creation'. No placeholder content found.

NON-COMPLIANT. The requested REQ-PROMPT corrections were made correctly; however, additional requirement ID discrepancies were discovered during verification. The RTM does not match SDLC-QMS-RS for the following items: (1) Line 85 Section 4: 'SDLC Namespace Registration' labeled REQ-DOC-012 should be REQ-DOC-013. (2) Line 86 Section 4: 'SDLC Document Identification' labeled REQ-DOC-012 should be REQ-DOC-014. (3) Line 113 Section 4: 'Assign Command' labeled REQ-TASK-003 should be REQ-TASK-004. (4) Line 369 Section 5.2: Heading states REQ-DOC-012 for SDLC Namespace Registration, should be REQ-DOC-013. (5) Line 380 Section 5.2: Heading states REQ-DOC-012 for SDLC Document Identification, should be REQ-DOC-014. (6) Line 674 Section 5.6: Heading states REQ-TASK-003 for Assign Command, should be REQ-TASK-004. All requirement IDs must match the source RS document exactly.

NON-COMPLIANT: Internal inconsistency in requirement counts. Section 2 Scope states 'REQ-DOC (Document Management): 12 requirements' but the Summary Matrix contains 14 REQ-DOC requirements (REQ-DOC-001 through REQ-DOC-014). Additionally, the total stated as '69 requirements' should be updated to 71 to reflect the actual count. Corrections required: (1) Update Section 2 line 'REQ-DOC (Document Management): 12 requirements' to '14 requirements', (2) Update total from '69 requirements' to '71 requirements'.

QA Review Complete. All corrections verified: (1) REQ-DOC-012/013/014 now unique and correctly assigned; (2) REQ-TASK-003/004 now unique; (3) All six REQ-PROMPT test function names corrected; (4) Section titles changed from 'Execution Notes' to 'Test Environment'; (5) Requirement counts updated to 71 total with REQ-DOC at 14; (6) Commit hash eff3ab7 documented. Frontmatter verified: title='QMS CLI Requirements Traceability Matrix', revision_summary='CR-028: Initial creation'. No placeholder content (TBD/TODO/FIXME). All 71 requirements traced to test functions. Document is COMPLIANT. Recommend approval.
